content.description: A student crosses a pure-breeding line of red-flowered poinsettias with a pure-breeding line of white-flowered poinsettias. The student observes that all the plants in the <math alttext="F 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>1</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> generation have pink flowers. The student then crosses the <math alttext="F 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>1</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> plants with one another and records observations about the plants in the <math alttext="F 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> generation. The student will use the <math alttext="F 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> data to perform a chi-square goodness-of-fit test for a model of incomplete dominance. The setup for the student’s chi-square goodness-of-fit test is presented in Table 1.
content.question: Table 1. A chi-square goodness-of-fit test for incomplete dominance Phenotype Observed Expected Red flowers 64 56 Pink flowers 107 112 White flowers 53 56 The critical value for a chi-square test with a significance level of <math alttext="p equals 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and 2 degrees of freedom is 5.99. Which of the following statements best completes the student’s chi-square goodness-of-fit test?

choices.label: The calculated chi-square value is 1.53, and the null hypothesis cannot be rejected.
The calculated chi-square value is 1.53, and the null hypothesis can be rejected.
The calculated chi-square value is 98, and the null hypothesis cannot be rejected.
The calculated chi-square value is 98, and the null hypothesis can be rejected.

content.answer: The calculated chi-square value is 1.53, and the null hypothesis cannot be rejected.
